title: Mr. Hides argvment before the Lords in the Vpper Hovse of Parliament, April 1641
author: Clarendon, Edward Hyde, Earl of, 1609-1674.
notes: Concerns the Council of the north, or the Court of York.
Attributed to the Earl of Clarendon. Cf. BLC.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
